H0.text: Bad Guys, You Give a Little Love & So You Wanna be a Boxer are all songs from which musical. Grease

H1.text: Bad Guys, You Give a Little Love & So You Wanna be a Boxer are all songs from which musical. West Side Story

H2.text: Bad Guys, You Give a Little Love & So You Wanna be a Boxer are all songs from which musical. Oliver

H3.text: Bad Guys, You Give a Little Love & So You Wanna be a Boxer are all songs from which musical. Bugsy Malone

A4.text: Bugsy Malone was Alan Parker's first feature film.

A5.text: This includes all the songs featured in the film and two new songs written by Williams.
